name: 汪昆立
objective: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction
2.　　The first law of thermodynamics and other basic concepts
3.　　Volumetric properties of pure fluid
4.　　Heat effects
5.　　The second law of thermodynamics
6.　　Thermodynamic properties of fluids
7.　　Vapor/liquid equilibrium
8.　　Solution thermodynamics
9.　　Chemical reaction equilibria
scorePolicy: Middle Examination 40%、Final Examination 40%、Usual Appearance 20%There will be severe penalty for being late or not attending the class. The maximum penalty will be the flunk at the end of semester.
materials:
Textbook:
Introduction to Chemical Engineering Thermodynamics, 6th ed., J. M. Smith et al., McGraw-Hill, 2001
Reference book:
Chemical and Engineering Thermodynamics, 3rd ed., Stanley I. Sandler, John Wiley & Sons, Inc. New York, 1999.
